observation: WRS Inc. Real Estate Investments | Commercial Real Estate Company  top of page HOME ABOUT US TEAM PRINCIPALS OPERATIONS & MARKETING DEVELOPMENT LEASING & SALES PROPERTY MANAGEMENT NEWS AVAILABLE PROPERTIES RETAIL OUTPARCELS OFFICE INDUSTRIAL NEW PROJECTS COMPLETED PROJECTS TENANTS CONTACT More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. REAL ESTATE INVESTMENTS WRS Inc. is a full-service commercial real estate development and investment firm that specializes in the development of retail, office, industrial and residential properties. TENANT LOGIN WE HAVE THE EXPERIENCE THE RESOURCES PROJECT VARIETY Since its inception in 2001, WRS Inc. has developed more than 42 retail centers and mixed-use projects. STRONG RELATIONSHIPS WRS Inc. has built its platform on strong relationships and its reputation as a trusted developer. EXPERIENCED DEVELOPERS Collectively, the WRS Inc. team has more than 150 years of experience in the development industry. WE KNOW DEVELOPMENT WRS Inc. is a full-service commercial real estate development and investment firm that specializes in retail, office, industrial and residential development, property management, commercial brokerage, and construction management. Since the company’s launch in 2001, WRS Inc. has developed more than 45 anchored retail shopping centers and mixed-use projects, comprising more than 10 million square-feet. ​ WRS Inc. often sources transactions through partnerships with landowners and local developers that need a partner that can bring a full Design-Build-Finance solution to complicated situations. Many of these landowners are community institutions and small local developers. WRS Inc. takes special pride in lending its expertise in these instances and has a proven track record of providing positive environmental and social impacts on communities across the Southeast while providing enhanced returns to its investors. stabilization and sale. RECENT TRANSACTIONS RETAIL LEASE JANUARY 18, 2024 WRS Inc. is pleased to announce that Max Dufour leased 1,600 square-feet of inline retail space at Glenn View Station in Durham, North Carolina to Hempie's. 1,600 square-feet of inline retail space at The Shoppes At Raeford INDUSTRIAL LEASE NOVEMBER 16, 2023 that Culler Bennett leased 4,541 square-feet of industrial space at 217 Cember Way (Bell Wright Business Park) in Summerville, South Carolina to The Construction Services Group. Available Inline Retail Space & Outparcels Available Walmart Anchored Commercial Outparcels Available Office Space Available Industrial / Flex Space Projects In Planning Phase Or Under Construction Available Retail, Outparcels, Office & Industrial Space WRS INC. OUR ADDRESS 410 Mill Street, Bldg. 1, Suite 200 Mount Pleasant, South Carolina 29464 Phone: 843.654.7888 Click Here To Find Us For any general inquiries, please fill in the following contact form: First Name Last Name Email Subject Message Submit Thanks for submitting! BACK TO TOP WRS Inc. Real Estate Investments | Phone 843.654.7888 | Fax: 843.654.7889 | www.wrsrealestate.com bottom of page

Scammers impersonate well-known companies, recruit for fake jobs on LinkedIn and other job platforms

thought: The certificates are valid and issued by a well-known certificate authority, Sectigo. This indicates that the website has a valid SSL certificate, which is a good sign of website security and legitimacy. I now know the final answer. Based on the information gathered and the observations made, the URL https://www.wrsrealestate.com/ does not exhibit the typical characteristics of a scam website. The WHOIS information is consistent with a legitimate business, there are no scam reports or negative reviews related to "WRS, Inc.," and the website has valid SSL certificates. The company has an established web presence, and its contact information appears to be appropriate for business use. Therefore, I conclude that the URL is not a scam website.
